title: The Besties Podcast XV
description: The Besties are back from their E3 sojourn and they've been playing all the latest games so they can talk about them, for that is the social contract you and they have entered into. Also, Russ Frushtick shares the sad, sad story of attempting to do a pull-up.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
